org.gvsig.fmap.dal.store.dbf.utils

Class DbaseFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.fmap.dal.store.dbf.utils.DbaseFile

  • public class DbaseFile
extends Object
    Class to read and write data to a dbase III format file. Creation date: (5/15/2001 5:15:13 PM)
